name: JakeSucksAtFighting
description:
Fight with 4 of your favourite people and characters from the JackSucksAtLife universe! Battle agaisnt friends or bots in the best game ever made™.

CONTROLS:
(There is also a controls menu on the games start screen)

  • Player 1:
    • Left: A
    • Right: D
    • Jump: W
    • Sprint: (Left) Shift
    • Attack 1: Space
    • Attack 2: C
  • Player 2:
    • Left: Left-Arrow
    • Right: Right-Arrow
    • Jump: Up-Arrow
    • Sprint: R-Shift
    • Attack 1: R-Ctrl
    • Attack 2: Down-Arrow
